item.title: projects
item.description: Feel free to email me for drafts or discussion. Decision rules for imprecise Lockeans I outline some ways to establish a utility-theoretic Lockean thesis connecting our rational beliefs to our rational imprecise credences. Relevance and the aim of inquiry I develop a relevance-first theory of rational inquiry, and relate it to accuracy-first theories of rational belief/credence. Question-sensitive beliefs and question-sensitive contents In a certain sense, our beliefs are question-sensitive. I reason about how this assumption should (not) affect our semantics of belief reports as well as our general theory of communication.
